channel.title: Project Happy's Server Development
channel.description:
[ul][list][CENTER][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x23/flame_mino/Happy-Professional.png[/img][/CENTER] [I]Project Happy is a server I have been developing for about half a year, the base for the server is Project v16. I began developing this server to get people to start thinking, hmm maybe its possible to make a good server without using a server with anything on it. I look forward to completing this server soon.[/I]
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] -A good attempt at fully working skills. [*]Mining [*]Fletching [*]Firemaking [*]Herblore [*]Runecrafting [/list] -A unique home at Rimmington (Never seen before) -Fully working Champions Guild -Fully working unique Trimming skill -A revamped complicated training procedure -A redone character design system
[B][U]Videos:[/U][/B] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=ProjectHappyArmorTrimming.flv]Trimming[/url] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=ChampionsChallangeVid.flv]Champions Guild[/url] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=HairsaloonVideo.flv]Hair Saloon[/url] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=ProjectHappyLegModifer.flv]Legs and Torso[/url] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=GloryAmulet.flv]Amulet of Glory[/url] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=gemcrafting-1.flv]Gem Crafting w/ Interfaces[/url][IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/newtag.jpg[/img] [*][url=http://s293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/?action=view&current=RunecraftingVid-1.flv]Runecrafting[/url][IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/newtag.jpg[/img][/ul]
[B][U]Pictures:[/U][/B] [CENTER] Training Process [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/GiantRat1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/HillGiant.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm45/HappyScape/Project%20Happy/Skeleton.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Happyman wrote:

Today I added full Gem Crafting with interfaces. Its almost 100% like RS except I’m not sure if its possible to turn Sapphires up into a crushed gem stone in Runescape. Anyways heres the video.

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:18, topic:238423”]I see something horribly wrong in your 1st sentence.

[quote]don’t get me wrong it’s an excellent server[/quote] = LIE!
Lol.[/quote]
I’m using allstar, but i Might switch over to Devo 7. I’ve been checking out a fiew dodian sources, trying to figure them out.

Ontopic~

Great job Happy, I like the clothes shop, and the armor trimming. I might just ask you a few things about it, as i was planning on doing the clothes thing on the hair cut shop at falador.

Read full topic

I actually like it, rep++[/quote][quote=“Spirit., post:40, topic:238423”]Nice I really like it Rep++.

Thank you guys for your friendly comments

[quote=“Djayboi6, post:41, topic:238423”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=314699.msg2502972#msg2502972 date=1224792136]

I enjoy criticism but that’s not criticism that’s being a little rude. I’m sorry but I’ve never used one tutorial to make anything on my server, [/quote]

Hmm, the “knowledge of gnarly” is more than likely, tutorials.

@xstrxpurez
The “normal” Runescape training areas are not attack dummies till level 8. That is only one of the ways to train. Runescape doesn’t have special “training areas”.

Why Make Fun Of Some1s Knowledge?[/quote]

I’m not sure exactly what that was all about lol.
